Package edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hdg

Class ProgressionTreeMap

java.lang.Object
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hdg.ProgressionTreeMap
public class ProgressionTreeMap extends Object
A wrapper around a progression tree which discovers all explained nodes in the tree and provides other methods for collecting data about those nodes.
Author:
Stephen G. Ware

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.ptree.ProgressionTree
    tree
    The progression tree that has already been expanded by a progression search

  • Field Details

    • tree

      public final edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.ptree.ProgressionTree tree
      The progression tree that has already been expanded by a progression search

  • Constructor Details

    • ProgressionTreeMap

      public ProgressionTreeMap(edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.ptree.ProgressionTree tree, edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.util.Worker.Status status)
      Constructs a new progression tree wrapper and explores the tree to find all explained nodes.
      Parameters:
      tree - a progression tree which has already been expanded by a progression search
      status - a status object to update while exploring the tree

  • Method Details

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the number of explained nodes found in the progression tree.
      Returns:
      the number of explained nodes in the tree

    • getNodes

      public Iterable<Long> getNodes()
      Returns a collection of all explained node IDs in the progression tree.
      Returns:
      a collection of all explained node IDs

    • getDistance

      public Integer getDistance(long node)
      Returns the minimum number of actions explained actions that can be taken from this node to reach a solution in the progression tree. A node which is itself a solution may have a value greater than 0 if it is possible to reach other, better solutions from that node.
      Parameters:
      node - the ID of an explained node
      Returns:
      the distance between the given node and its nearest solution

    • isSolution

      public boolean isSolution(long node)
      Checks whether the plan leading to a given node is a solution, meaning that it improved the utility of a node's character via a sequence of explained actions.
      Parameters:
      node - the node to check
      Returns:
      true if the node is one of the explained nodes whose plan is a solution

    • getCharacter

      public edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.Character getCharacter(long node)
      Returns the character associated with the given node.
      Parameters:
      node - a node in the progression tree
      Returns:
      the character associated with that node or null if the node is associated with the author

    • getEpistemicPath

      public edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.util.ImmutableList<edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.Character> getEpistemicPath(long node)
      Returns the sequence of characters corresponding to a given node's theory of mind. If the list [X, Y] is returned, it means the given node represents what X believes Y believes.
      Parameters:
      node - a node from the progression tree
      Returns:
      a sequence of character representing the node's theory of mind or an empty sequence of the node is associated with the author (i.e. the actual state)

    • getPlan

      public edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.Plan<edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.Action> getPlan(long node)
      Returns the sequence of actions that led to the state represented by a given node. The plan will always start at the initial state, which means it may contain dummy actions that updated the beliefs of characters.
      Parameters:
      node - a node from the progression tree
      Returns:
      the sequence of actions that led from the initial state to the state represented by the node

    • getUtility

      public double getUtility(long node)
      Returns the utility of the node's character in the state represented by the given node.
      Parameters:
      node - a node from the progression tree
      Returns:
      the utility of the character, or NaN if the utility is unknown

    • getState

      public List<edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.logic.Assignment> getState(long node)
      Returns an assignment of a value to every fluent defined in the progression tree's problem based on the state represented by a given node.
      Parameters:
      node - a node from the progression tree
      Returns:
      a list of assignments where each fluent has the value it has in the state represented by the given node
